b4658866-5aa9-43d5-aebe-e6338da2250b.description: Students started at the very beginning & learned about Drawing Scale. Classes are thorough and detailed. Students learned how blueprint drawings are organized and how information is referenced throughout a set of construction blueprint drawings. Students reviewed architectural and engineering drawings and learned about project specifications. Students demonstrated an understanding of the inter-relationship between the drawings for Custom Residential and Mixed-Use Commercial projects.
b4658866-5aa9-43d5-aebe-e6338da2250b.name: Blueprint Reading Fundamentals Bundle

issuer.summary: issued by Virtual Design & Construction Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Two Courses Listed Below (Total 30 clock hours).

c75d1c18-702b-4923-b649-9b71e449e0ca.description: Students learned the fundamentals of Revit, the world's-leading Building Information Modeling (BIM) software program. This Revit Fundamentals Bundle is an introduction and intermediate level program using Revit. Two commercial projects are created. The courses work together. The course lessons build on lessons learned in the previous courses. Learn the best workflows & strategies for completing projects. The courses are hands-on, real-world, project-based and instructor-led.
c75d1c18-702b-4923-b649-9b71e449e0ca.name: Revit Fundamentals Bundle

issuer.summary: issued by Virtual Design & Construction Institute

f4a48b60-ddb3-4c96-ae33-dfb2eba150e4.description: This career education training bundle gets students up-and-running using AutoCAD. Starting at the beginning, students created numerous plan and elevation drawings and printed their work to a scale. Students created an abbreviated set of construction documents. The courses work together. The course lessons build on lessons learned in the previous courses. Learned the best workflows & strategies for completing projects. The courses are hands-on, real-world, project-based and instructor-led.
f4a48b60-ddb3-4c96-ae33-dfb2eba150e4.name: AutoCAD Fundamentals Bundle

0173ba49-e2ef-4e51-91b4-c44389d6b01b.description: Students start at the beginning with Blueprint Reading - Residentail and Commercail. Students learn about the types of estimates and how an estimate is organized. The components and sub-components of an estimate will be addressed.
0173ba49-e2ef-4e51-91b4-c44389d6b01b.name: Construction Estimating Fundamentals Bundle

8df9e6f5-97a7-4521-bc16-c43973a145a1.description: This bundle is geared for students wanting to pursue careers in the Mechanical, Electrical and Plumbing (MEP) fields. Courses began with the fundamentals of Revit & BIM and progress into the MEP-specifics of Revit MEP. Created two sets of construction documents. The courses worked together. The course lessons build on lessons learned in previous courses. Learned the best workflows & strategies for completing projects. The courses were hands-on, real-world, project-based and instructor-led.
8df9e6f5-97a7-4521-bc16-c43973a145a1.name: Revit MEP Professional Bundle

ef127cc0-3e39-4700-80d2-f553396ac152.description: The CAD/BIM Technology Certificate Program taught the student the skills, technical knowledge & problem-solving strategies requested by employers using Computer-Aided Design (CAD) & Building Information Modeling (BIM) software. Student worked on commercial & residential projects with AutoCAD & Revit. Courses in the Program are hands-on, real-world, project-based and instructor-led. Student designed their own Certificate Completion Practical. The Program was completed in as few as 12 months.
ef127cc0-3e39-4700-80d2-f553396ac152.name: CAD/BIM Technology Certificate Program

0f9bd315-792d-4b35-8037-f21dd79028e5.description: Student learned about every major material and system in a building. Learned the terminology and developed a very strong understanding of how a building is built. The course content is absolutely relevant to all team members on a building construction project. The classes are thorough and detailed. Starting at the very beginning, student learned about the design and construction team and the order in which various construction disciplines build their respective building components.
0f9bd315-792d-4b35-8037-f21dd79028e5.name: Construction Fundamentals Bundle

badge_template_activities.title: CFC 101 - Construction Fundamentals - Team Overview, Site Utilities, Earthwork and Foundations.
CFC 102 - Construction Fundamentals - The Building Structure.
CFC 103 - Construction Fundamentals - The Building Envelope.
CFC 104 - Construction Fundamentals - Interiors and Finish Site Work.
CFC 105 - Construction Fundamentals - Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing and AV-Tel-Data.
CFC 106 - Construction Fundamentals - Fire Protection, Startup/Testing and Closeout.

a69cbab2-7195-4ff8-9f19-9f41be7795e0.description: In this bundle, learn AutoCAD from the beginning. Prepare for the AutoCAD Professional certification exam. Learn the concepts and skills relevant to creating two sets of construction documents using AutoCAD. The learning outcomes of these five classes align with the objectives of the certification exams. Learn the concepts and skillsets relevant to creating a set of construction documents. Courses are hands-on, real-world, project-based & instructor-led.
a69cbab2-7195-4ff8-9f19-9f41be7795e0.name: AutoCAD Professional Bundle

issuer.summary: issued by Virtual Design & Construction Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Completed five AutoCAD courses. Prepared sets of construction documents for two residential projects. Courses are hands-on, real-world, project-based & instructor-led. Included two attempts at the AutoCAD and Revit Certification Exam.

9837ccbb-4587-454d-a442-70ea9fe904ea.description: In this SketchUp training bundle, students were introduced to the SketchUp interface & tools to create elements and complete SketchUp 3D modeling and rendering projects. Began with an introduction to SketchUp. Students advanced through material mapping, advanced 3D modeling & camera positioning to create walk-throughs of 3D SketchUp models. Learned the best workflows & strategies for completing projects. The courses are hands-on, real-world, project-based and instructor-led.
9837ccbb-4587-454d-a442-70ea9fe904ea.name: SketchUp Fundamentals Bundle

b8ee0c7e-77eb-4e49-9cfb-62e84a1c9cd9.description: This Bundle is for students with AutoCAD experience who want to move into Civil 3D. These Civil 3D courses are built upon existing AutoCAD experience, and introduce fundamental and intermediate concepts on how to successfully work with Civil 3D. The learning outcomes of these four classes align with the objectives of the certification exams. Student learned to create a set of construction documents using Civil 3D. Courses are hands-on, real-world, project-based & instructor-led.
b8ee0c7e-77eb-4e49-9cfb-62e84a1c9cd9.name: Civil 3D Previous Experience Bundle

bc9db8f7-f125-4c90-991b-4506f719f1d8.description: In the BIM Technology Certificate Program, the student created a 3D model of a moderately complex commercial project and extracted the construction documents directly from the Revit (BIM) model. All of the courses worked together, so the student constantly built on lessons learned in the previous courses. The courses are hands-on, real-world, project-based and instructor-led. Student designed their own Certificate Completion Practical. The Program was completed in as few as 9 months.
bc9db8f7-f125-4c90-991b-4506f719f1d8.name: BIM Technology Certificate Program

4da08fb0-bf25-46d9-ae29-712b3bb60c82.description: The Civil 3D Bundle is geared towards students with no AutoCAD experience. Student learned the fundamentals of AutoCAD and then advanced into Civil 3D. Student learned the fundamentals & intermediate skills using Civil 3D, including surfaces, parcels, profiles, grading, pipe networks and prepared a set of construction documents using Civil 3D. Student developed intermediate-level Civil 3D skills. The class curriculum was hands-on, real-world, project-based & instructor-led.

6514670e-5ada-4c1c-a83b-b78973dc6a8a.description: Students learned a large variety of essential skill topics designed to aid them in their career path. Finally, students learned how to use teamwork, collaboration, and leadership in order to keep a project moving forward.
